title: Twitter, Markets, Housing, And Jewelry (Podcast)
itunes:title: Twitter, Markets, Housing, And Jewelry (Podcast)
description:
Dan Genter, CEO and CIO of Genter Capital Management, discusses the markets and the economy in 2022. Natalie Wolfsen, CEO at AssetMark, joins the show to talk about market and economic trends as well as how AssetMark is supporting and growing financial advisors. Dan Ives, senior equity analyst and managing director at WedBush Securities, joins the show to discuss Twitter, Elon Musk, and Tesla. Brad Dillman, Chief Economist at Cortland, joins the show to discuss mortgage interest rates and the Case Shiller Home price index. Alexander Lacik, CEO at Pandora Group, joins the show to discuss managing his company amid inflation, supply concerns, and other economic pressures. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
